channel.title: Features on Wanderer Demo Stie
channel.description: Recent content in Features on Wanderer Demo Stie

item.title: Code Blocks
item.description: Without type This is plain code block without setting any type Bash block echo "This is bash command" And this one has long lines echo "This is a very long bash command that cannot fit into content area of the generated website, so it needs a scrollbar" This is javascript let x = 0; x += 1; console.log(x);

item.title: Documents
item.description: This is page content. All documents stored in docs subdirectory are listed below this paragraph. docs/lorem-ipsum.pdf - Lorem Ipsum Example

item.title: Galleries
item.description: If there are some images stored as resources for given page, theme will render interactive image gallery at the bottom of the page. This example also demonstrate how to use resources metadata to describe and order images.

item.title: Large Images
item.description: This is very large image, that should be fitted into content width:

item.title: Map - Single post
item.description: If there is at least one gpx file in resources of given page, it will be automatically rendered at the bottom of the page, including basic legend with distance, time and possibility to download individual gpx files
